body:
The spack graphviz package does not have support for PDF. If there is a variant that enables this support, it is unclear to me which one it is. The *quartz* variant is only for macos.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install graphviz
$ dot -T?
```
No pdf in list. My linux distribution version does have pdf support, so this doesn't seem like a licensing issue.
title: Graphviz PDF Support
